div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 09:56 am CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 75. South southwest wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest 16 to 21 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 29 mph.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 49. Windy, with a north northwest wind 23 to 28 mph decreasing to 14 to 19 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 39 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 72. North northwest wind around 11 mph.

span.span: Crooked Oak will be serving breakfast/lunch to any child 18 or below starting Monday, March 23, 2020. The meals will be served sack-lunch style and may be picked up from a Crooked Oak School Suburban at the following locations from 11:00-11:30 a.m.
Covid-19 social distancing recommendations will be followed. We respectfully ask our kids to stay a minimum of 6’ apart and continue to stay safe.

a.aria-label: Read more about Meal Service during COVID-19 Shutdown

div.p: There will be no school for students until April 6, 2020. More information will be provided as soon as it is available.
No hay clases para estudiantes hasta el 6 de Abril de 2020. Se proporcionara mas infromacion tan pronto como este disponible.

div.p: With school beginning just around the corner, it is almost time to get your children registered. Enrollment for the 2019/2020 School Year will be held August 5-7.

Information needed to register students:
-Address Verification-can be a utility bill (gas, water, electric), Lease or deed to current home, business mail with your name and address listed (cable bill, cell phone bill, etc.)
-Photo ID
-Student birth certificate, current shot records, and Social Security card.
If you have any questions, please feel free to call the Administration Office.
